title: F.Y.I.:  Charter / Spectrum "dropped" Thunderbird
content:
After having trouble sending email with Thunderbird, I contacted Spectrum, a.k.a. Charter , support. It turns out, Spectrum will no longer connect with Thunderbird:

"Thank you so much for your patience! I was doing some research and Spectrum is not allowing links with thunderbird server as of March 2024. You can use spectrum email on apple mail or outlook going forward but thunderbird email linking has been eliminated."

Thought you would like to know.

By the way, I'm using Linux (KUbuntu 22.04).
creator: MarathonToo

title: Chyba zobrazení vybraného emailu.
content: Dobrý den, prosím o pomoc s řešením problému na který jsem nyní narazil. Při kliknutí na email se mi zobrazí email jiný, rozhozeny jsou hlavičky (odesílatel a předmět). Při kliknutí na email, který se mi zobrazí mám ale email prázdný. Omlouvám se za asi nepochopitelná popis, nicméně obrázky to snad dokáží objasnit. Obrázek 1: Vybrán email od paní Šebestové, předmět souhlasí ve výběrovém okně i v okně s textem emailu. Odesílatel a text emailu je ovšem jiný (měl by to být email, který přišel o dva emaily dřív (Re:Bytové větrání). Obrázek 2: Vybrán email od pana Šafáře, kde by měl být text, který byl na obrázku 1, nicméně zde není nic, ani odesílatel, ani předmět. Ještě doplním, že emaily se stahují z poštovního serveru IMAP (synology). Když emaily procházím přímo tam, tak žádný problém není. Předem děkuji moc za tipy, čím by mohlo být způsobeno a jak tuto chybu napravit.
creator: elbeduard

title: problems when printing emails to printer
content: since installing thunderbird 115.11.1 I get a whole page of rubbish before the actual email message received when i print out my emails. How do I stop this?
creator: pbate

title: Thunderbird CardDAV address book synchronization fails when VCARD contains custom property
content:
I have a SOGo server that holds my address book. The SOGo web interface allows setting of custom properties, something I have used for a long time without problems. I have accessed the address book with Thunderbird both on Windows and Linux (today Windows 11 and Debian 12).

Lately I have problems with synchronization and now I have tried to understand why. I believe that the problem is connected with the transition to vCard Storage in Thunderbird. (See https://developer.thunderbird.net/thunderbird-development/codebase-overview/address-book)

In the Thunderbird error console (on Debian 12 using Thunderbird 115.11.0(64-bit)) I get for a simple VCARD with one custom property (which I created in SOGo):

09:24:18,136 carddav.sync: Error parsing: BEGIN:VCARD UID:56377-6667FA00-1F-59090880.vcf VERSION:3.0 CLASS:PUBLIC PROFILE:VCARD N:With Custom 1;AAAAAAA FN:AAAAAAA CUSTOM1:My custom value END:VCARD CardDAVDirectory.jsm:595:15

09:24:18,136 NS_ERROR_UNEXPECTED: Unable to set Custom1 as a property, use vCardProperties 

   setProperty resource:///modules/AddrBookCard.jsm:394    vCardToAbCard chrome://sogo-connector/content/messenger/startup-overlay.js:551    fetchAllFromServer resource:///modules/CardDAVDirectory.jsm:590

CardDAVDirectory.jsm:596:19

It does not matter if the SOGo Connector plugin is activated or not.

Best regards Jan
creator: janskarvall

title: migrazione versione / importazione
content:
Salve, ho aggiornato thunderbird all'ultima versione, all'avvio il programma a chiesto di creare un nuovo profilo perché il vecchio era incompatibile. Creato il nuovo profilo e relativa procedura di impostazione degli account, l'elenco delle vecchie email è quindi sparito (avevo account POP3). Ho tentato la procedura di importazione da vecchi profili che il programma trova in locale, ma da nessuno di essi si recuperano le vecchie email. Ho aperto le cartelle e mi sembrerebbe che ci siano file utilizzabili, ma il risultato è negativo. Potete aiutarmi a recuperare le vecchie email? C'è un modo per verificare la presenza dei files necessari?

Grazie del supporto.

Alessio
creator: alekonn3t

title: thunderbird unwanted mails
content: thurderbird places keeps on correcting wanted mails into unwanted mails. Several mails mails from one (wanted) sender are placed in the spambox . I have changed the status from unwanted into wanted a lot of times, but thunderbird keeps on going placing them back in the unwanted box, even faster then i can correct it. Can you please help with a definitive solution, so i can see all emails from this sender in the normal inbox. with kind regards, monique van Wensveen

creator: info11458

title: Configurare Thunderbird come semplice contenitore di file Mbox (gmail) per consultazione (traccia storica)
content:
Salve, provo ad essere più semplice, chiaro e sintetico possibile. Situazione: casella di Gmail pressoché piena, ho letto che è possibile estrarne gruppi di email organizzate in formato MBox. L'ho fatto ed adesso sul pc ho alcuni file con estensione MBox (sono estrazioni di test, leggere, con poche email, giusto per vedere come funziona). Vorrei caricarli su Thunderbird SENZA creare un account esistente e attivo, la consultazione di queste email mi serve SOLO come memoria storica (età delle email > 10 anni) per cui è estremamente improbabile ne abbia bisogno (ma non si sa mai...). Thunderbird installato e fatto partire, sono stato obbligato a inserire un account finto (non mi serve e non voglio lavorare da Thunderbird). Ho caricato l'estensione "ImportExport" e vorrei caricare i file MBox tra le cartelle locali ma l'estensione mi mi chiede di caricare un profilo e non c’è verso di caricare i file MBox.

Sicuramente mi manca qualcosa ma.... cosa?

Grazie in anticipo Alessandro
creator: a.delcorto

title: Thunderbird ignores themes on Plasma - wayland
content:
thunderbird 115.12.0 (64-bit) Operating System: KDE neon 6.0 KDE Plasma Version: 6.0.5 KDE Frameworks Version: 6.2.0 Qt Version: 6.7.0 Kernel Version: 6.5.0-35-generic (64-bit) Graphics Platform: Wayland

Setting themes to an addon - eco theme ( or any other ) , the theme is applied, after restating thunderbird it ignored even though it indicates its enabled. The theme applied is all white
creator: arddix2

title: Filter or Addon on emails delivered by odd and even time
content:
Hello,

I work in a company and we are using Thunderbird for emails. The way me and my coworkers work is that we solving emails we get. BUT. There are two people always here on emails. One of them is taking ODD emails, the second one EVEN. For example I'm the ODD one, so every email that comes in odd time for example 8:31, 8:43, 8:47 etc., are mine and the other person who is EVEN one have emails like 8:30, 8:40, 8:52 etc. So if I make 2 folders one will be called EVEN and the other one ODD is there some way to filter these emails by time?

Thanks for your help and answers
creator: minemoversk

title: autenticazione server smtp.office365.com non riuscita

Come risolvere?

title: userChrome not working
content:
I would like to customize styling for recurring events in Calendar (115.11.1 on MacOS) without using extensions/add-ons. I enabled userChrome.css (`toolkit.legacyUserProfileCustomizations.stylesheets`) and the “has:” selector (`layout.css.has-selector.enabled`). In my userChrome.css, I added styles: 

   li:has([alt*="Recurring"]) { background-color:grey !important; padding:1rem !important; }    li:has(*[alt*="Recurring"]) { background-color:yellow !important; padding:1rem !important; }

Unfortunately, this seems to have no effect upon restarting Thunderbird. However, when I open Developer Toolbox (`Tools > Developer Toolbox > Developer Toolbox > Inspector` tab) suddenly everything works and the stylesheets are applied, but only until Thunderbird is shut down. Weirdly, other custom styles in userChrome.css work ok.

Is this intended behavior or a bug?
creator: adam.jan.piotrowski
